overview: A teenage girl, Yazmin is driven out of her own house by her father on account of her step mother. She works as a night club singer and has problem with her unfaithful boyfriend. Frustrated, she goes to Cameron Highlands to meet her uncle. There, she meets Hamid who sympathises and finds her a job as a private nurse to Zahari who has a heart problem. Yazminâ€™s presence brings fresh hope to Zahari.
title: Impian
